type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Second Generation[/i] – Whenever Seliph, Son of Sigurd or another creature you control with base power 2 or less enters, you get an experience counter.
[i]Final Act[/i] – Whenever Seliph attacks, creatures you control with base power 2 or less get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of experience counters you have.
Partner with Julia, Daughter of Deirdre
